programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: Deep in the Pacific Ocean, a string of islands is the staging ground for the wildest ever dating experience. Six couples - Brie and Byron, Amy and Mike and Georgia and Chad - have been matched at a specially designed speed dating event and will now marry and spend the next 21 days stranded on Honeymoon Island, away from everyone and everything they know.

programme.title: Stranded On Honeymoon Island: Australia
programme.desc: While Georgia and Chad and Brie and Byrons relationships are full of chemistry and attraction, the only thing simmering for Amy and Mike is tension. But theres always hope because three new couples tie the knot and are whisked away to Honeymoon Island. Romance is in the air as relationships blossom before a reality check puts on the brakes for one couple. Mysterious crates wash up on the island, revealing insights into the couples past, which means a better understanding of their partners.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy is double-booked himself, so he asks Jamma to house-sit and let the builder in. Jamma finds Guys manuscript about exes. Isaac comes over to calm Jamma down. Farida arrives with divorce papers and a new showbiz career to show off about.

programme.title: Juice
programme.desc: Guy doesnt want to see Jamma anymore, so when Jamma meets a magical stranger who offers to unburden him from his clownish ways to win Guy back, he decides to take the deal and is transformed. programme.title: This Is BBC TWO
programme.desc: Preview of upcoming programmes from BBC Two.

programme.title: Take a Hike
programme.desc: 51-year-old fitness and body coach Zara takes the group on a hike across Llandudnos Great Orme. They climb the hillside to reach the summit, past the historic Great Orme tramway.

programme.title: Countryfile
programme.desc: Matt Baker and Charlotte Smith are in Wrexham for the biggest date in the sheepdog trialling calendar - the Supreme. Set against the beautiful backdrop of Brynkinalt Estate, the finest dogs and handlers from across the UK and Ireland go head-to-head, showing off their skill, instinct and teamwork. After months of training and a year of tough qualifying trials, it all comes down to this - only one can walk away as Supreme Champion.

programme.title: Breakfast
programme.desc: The BBCs Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

programme.title: Weatherman Walking
programme.desc: On a mission to dig out some of his greatest adventures from the past, Derek revisits three memorable walks from mid-Wales. On his first wander, he is joined by opera singer Beverley Humphreys as they walk in the footsteps of one of historys most impressive sopranos atthe Craig-Y-Nos estate. He learns of the epic barefoot 26-mile journey of a devoted teenage girl in Abergynolwyn. Finally, Derek takes the plunge at the bog snorkelling world championships in Llanwrtyd Wells.

programme.title: Landward
programme.desc: Dougie sets sail to see the famous Bass Rock gannet colony as it recovers from avian flu, and moth expert Leanna Fernandez discovers the rare mountain burnet near Braemar.

programme.title: Saturday Kitchen Best Bites
programme.desc: An array of tasty treats from Jane Baxter, Sertaç Dirik, Yotam Ottolenghi, Noor Murad and Chantelle Nicholson. Meanwhile, Rick Stein and the Hairy Bikers head out across the UK.

programme.title: Nadiyas British Food Adventure
programme.desc: Nadiyas first stop is to visit asparagus farmer Imogen Stanley where she gets to use a specially designed asparagus buggy to harvest the veg which she and cooks in a stir-fry. Her next stop is to build a cold smoker in Milton Keynes.

programme.title: Hairy Bikers Bakeation
programme.desc: The half-way point of the Hairy Bikers Bakeation sees them journey to the furthest reaches of Europe culminating in an amazing family party thrown by Daves wife Lil, who comes from Romania. Three countries - Slovakia, Hungary and Romania - provide the Bikers with ample opportunity to explore some great baking.

programme.title: Natural World
programme.sub-title: Return of the Giant Killers: Africas Lion Kings
programme.desc: Revisiting the Savute Marshs pride of lions in Southern Africa, who re-wrote the laws of nature and started to hunt elephants in order to stave off starvation and survive.

programme.title: The Big Country
programme.desc: A retired sea captain gets into a battle for water rights when he arrives in Texas to marry a ranchers daughter. When he sees his fiancee, he calls off the engagement and instead marries the local teacher.

programme.title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid
programme.desc: A pair of train robbers are forced to go on the run when the Union Pacific Railroad tires of being targeted and sets a posse on their trail. After being hounded across the Old West, they decide to hook up with a girlfriend and head for South America, where they are unknown.

programme.title: Flog It!
programme.desc: Paul Martin presents from Boconnoc House in the Cornish countryside, the estate and house dating back to 1086. Catherine Southon enthuses about a collection of airline memorabilia, and Nick Hall finds a jar that contained the childhood remedy Virol.

programme.title: Saving Lives at Sea
programme.desc: The Blackpool crew receive reports of a man struggling in the water at midnight. Its vital to get him urgent medical attention.

programme.title: Eva Longoria: Searching for Spain
programme.desc: Eva Longoria visits Andalusia, the birthplace of flamenco and bullfighting; from jamon iberico to tapas, she savours the iconic flavours of the region.

programme.title: Pilgrimage
programme.sub-title: The Road to the Scottish Isles
programme.desc: Seven well-known personalities with differing faiths and beliefs put on their backpacks and waterproofs and set out on foot, by road and sea, travelling over 1,600km to learn about a key figure in early British Christianity, St Columba.

programme.title: Rob Brydons Honky Tonk Road Trip
programme.desc: Rob heads to the beating heart of country music, Nashville. He explores iconic venues like the Ryman Auditorium, goes live on-air at WSM Radio, and meets country stars old and new.

programme.title: Later ... with Jools Holland
programme.desc: With rock n roll legend Robert Plant, singer-songwriter Olivia Dean, French singer-songwriter Jehnny Beth, folk musician James Yorkston and spoken word artist, musician and poet Joshua Idehen.

programme.title: Walk the Line
programme.desc: Acclaimed biographical film of country musics legendary `man in black. The film follows Cash from his childhood, where he was touched by tragedy, through his years on the road to his marriage to June Carter, who was country royalty, and their struggle to find happiness as she weans him off booze and drugs.

programme.title: His House
programme.desc: A refugee couple makes a harrowing escape from war-torn South Sudan, but then they struggle to adjust to their new life in an English town that has an evil lurking beneath the surface.

programme.title: Question Time
programme.desc: Features a studio audience quizzing top politicians on the events of the day. The panel surrounding presenter Fiona Bruce is composed of at least one member of the three major parties.

programme.title: Panorama
programme.desc: Secret filming by Panorama reveals evidence of racism, misogyny, and officers revelling in the use of force at one of Londons busiest police stations, Charing Cross. After the murder of Sarah Everard by a serving police officer the Metropolitan Police promised change and says that since 2022 more than 1,400 officers have either been dismissed or have resigned following a clamp down on what it calls "rogue officers".

programme.title: LEGO Scooby-Doo: Knight Time Terror
programme.desc: When an old, haunted house known as Grimsley Mansion opens to the public, Mystery, Inc. investigates to solve the mystery behind a legendary Black Knight.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: The team is back and just as courageous, adventurous, humorous and obsessed with cases like before. They are joined by celebrities in their adventures and ghost hunts and in search of puzzles to solve.

programme.title: Trick or Treat Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Scooby and the gang spring into action when menacing doppelganger ghosts threaten Halloween.

programme.title: Whats New Scooby-Doo?
programme.sub-title: Big Scare in the Big Easy
programme.desc: A New Orleans graveyard is the setting for a ghostly re-enactment of a duel.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo and Guess Who?
programme.desc: When Scooby and the gang accept an invitation from famous actor Malcolm McDowell to take an exploratory trip through time, they find themselves actually travelling into the future.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: To solve the mystery of a creepy Crystal Crawler, a bat-like cave monster, the Gang must head into the Crystal Canopy, a labyrinth of intricate crystals!

programme.title: Scooby-Doo, Where Are You!
programme.desc: The gang investigate the disappearance of a prized poodle by using Scooby as a decoy to unveil the thief... until Scooby is also kidnapped.

programme.title: Scooby-Doo! Mystery Incorporated
programme.desc: Freds favourite adventurer, Rick Spartan, has come to town to take over the schools biology class. But Rick is not alone - he is being haunted by The Headless Creature, a monster from the Amazon who believes Rick has taken his head and who now wants it back.

programme.title: Grizzy and The Lemmings
programme.sub-title: Fake Brothers; Mind in a Whirl; A Sizeable Problem
programme.desc: Even for a giant seven foot bear, its not easy getting rid of pesky Lemmings but its all fun seeing them constantly try to outsmart each other with cheeky plans!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Shine, Lilit, Shine; Eyes on the Surprise
programme.desc: The Beacon Mushroom that guides the Mushables back to Mushton in the dark has gone out. Every time Mush-Mush has tried to surprise his friend with a gift, Chep has always found out what it was.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.sub-title: Grasshopper Chep; My Muddy Buddy; Mushlers To The Rescue; Shine, Lilit, Shine

programme.desc: Its Bings third birthday! Bing shows Sula, Pando and Coco how to do the waka-oke. When Pando doesnt do it properly, a frustrated Bing hides under his blankey. Flop gently helps Bing to understand that Pando likes to do things differently to him.

programme.title: Bluey

programme.title: Bluey
programme.desc: When Dad complains about how dissimilar Bluey and Bingo are, Bluey hatches a plan to make them more alike and happily introduces Mini-Bluey.

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee puts his delicious homemade apple pie on the windowsill to cool down, but the second his back is turned its gone. Who took it? Can the Squirrels find out? Fortunately, Duggee has his detective badge - and there are some very small footprints to follow. The Squirrels go and find lots of clues to help Duggee solve the mystery. Being a detective is hard work!

programme.title: Hey Duggee
programme.desc: Duggee is sewing a snazzy poncho, and the Squirrels want to make one too. They all get down to some sewing and its very quiet in the clubhouse until they hear a very loud sneeze! Its so loud that everything starts to shake. Where is it coming from? Duggee and the Squirrels go off and investigate, following the sneezes all the way to a polar bear with a very bad cold. He needs a hanky. What could they use instead?

programme.title: My World Kitchen
programme.desc: Vinnies family is English and they come from a city called Bristol, which is located in the west of England. Bristol is famous for hot-air balloons and pirates! Vinnie makes his tarts by mixing the leaves from parsley and thyme into cream cheese.

programme.title: My First Festivals
programme.desc: We follow James and his family as they learn about and celebrate the harvest season. James is helping Dad around their farm, spreading hay for the cows and feeding milk to their calves with his sister Grace.

programme.title: Ranger Hamzas Eco Quest
programme.desc: Ranger Hamza and the Ramblers discover how stinging nettles play an important role in the environment. They find out that a nettles sting can help protect it as well as some insects that shelter on them. They learn that nettles can also be food for some animals too. On the way, they try some nettle tea and pretend to be stinging nettles, trying to keep Ranger Hamzas Mr Fox away!

programme.title: Steve and Aneeshwar Go Wild
programme.desc: Steve and Aneeshwar meet two of the tallest animal in the world, the giraffe, who show them their incredibly long tongues that they use to pick the leaves from tall trees in the wild. Next, they visit some red pandas, whose red fur has a thick layer underneath to keep them warm. Steve and Aneeshwar then reveal the wild connection that links these two animals.

programme.title: Dodges Pup School
programme.desc: Following Dodge at Pup School, a place full of mishaps and mayhem. Dodge and his pup pals turn school days into adventures with singing, silliness, and occasional squeaky toys.

programme.title: Octonauts
programme.desc: The Octonauts and some helpless crabs are caught between two territorial groups of aggregating anemones and their numbers are growing.

programme.title: Vida the Vet
programme.desc: Its a very hot day in Sweetwood, and Tidbit is really tired. Luckily, Vida knows why - he needs to hydrate! Vida helps Tidbit find a way to play and hydrate at the same time.

programme.title: Go Jetters
programme.desc: After a rainbow appears over the Go Jet Academy, Glitch becomes fascinated with the legend of a pot of gold appearing at the end of it. He tries to create his own, bigger rainbow, ignoring Ubercorns warnings that their ends can never be reached. When he instead causes a huge storm to appear, the Go Jetters must work fast to stop the Academy from flooding.

programme.title: Love Monster
programme.desc: Love Monster is finding it hard to think of something new to do on Do Something New Day, so he heads to Tiniest Fluffiest Bunnys house to see if she has any ideas.

programme.title: Yukee

programme.title: Roots and Fruits

programme.title: Puffin Rock

programme.title: Maddies Do You Know?
programme.desc: Maddie is finding out about the life cycle of plants! She visits a gigantic tomato growing farm and uses her special time-lapse camera to discover how a plant germinates from a seed and grows into a shoot. Next, she travels in a lift to the top of the high greenhouse to see the flowers and tomato fruits growing. We learn how the plant needs water, sunlight and carbon dioxide to make its own energy to grow.

programme.title: Mojo Swoptops

programme.title: Most Ridiculous

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: The boys are back! Bradley and Barney Walsh embark on a 3,000-mile journey through Europe, starting off in the sunny south of Croatia and ending up in the ice-cold Arctic Circle in Scandinavia. Theres no easing his dad in on this trip for Barney. First up, they swing off the roof of Splits iconic football stadium, before diving headfirst into the crystal clear waters of the Adriatic Sea. The action continues when the pair go head to head on aqua bikes alongside a former world champion.

programme.title: Bradley and Barney Walsh: Breaking Dad
programme.desc: Bradley and Barney leave Croatia behind and say hello to Hungary, where the boys take to the open waters of Lake Balaton for a spot of high-speed catamaran sailing before warming up with some world-famous goulash. The pair finish their time in Budapest, where Barney and Bradley meet a world-famous escapologist.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Male Nanny
programme.desc: Ross mocks Rachels new male nanny, and Chandler becomes upset when Monica says that somebody from her job is the funniest guy shes ever met.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Other Sister
programme.desc: On the night before Thanksgiving, Rachels self-centred younger sister Amy ruins everyones holiday dinner with her uncensored observations. Meanwhile, Monica obsessively protects her good wedding china, and Joey forgets to join his television cast mates in the big Thanksgiving parade.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Rachels Phone Number
programme.desc: Rachel impulsively gives a handsome restaurant patron her telephone number, and worries that hell call when Ross is in their apartment. Meanwhile, Phoebes boyfriend Mike and Ross desperately try to find something in common to talk about when they babysit Emma, and Chandler returns from Tulsa to visit Monica, but must hide from Joey after rejecting his offer of free basketball tickets.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With Christmas in Tulsa
programme.desc: Chandler is forced to remain in Tulsa over the Christmas period due to a major deadline at work, and Monica fears the worst when she finds out that he will be joined in Tulsa by a beautiful colleague Wendy. While he works, Chandler recalls some of the more embarrassing moments from previous holidays shared with his friends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Rachel Goes Back to Work
programme.desc: When Rachel returns to her office to show off baby Emma, she is surprised to find handsome temp Gavin has been doing her job while she has been away on maternity leave. Their immediate war of wills prompts Rachel to make a rash decision.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Phoebe and Mike parent baby rats born in her cabinet, Rachel gets steamed after Monica invites a rival to her birthday bash, and Joey likes Emmas new nanny.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: While Rachel tries to sort out her mixed feelings for her handsome colleague Gavin, Ross recruits Chandler to help him meet attractive women and make Rachel jealous. Meanwhile, Phoebe regrets bringing Monica to a karaoke night when she takes the microphone and delights in the applause, unaware that the men in the audience are cheering because they can see through her dress, and Joey submits to painful eyebrow waxing.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Blind Dates
programme.desc: Joey and Phoebe conspire to arrange awful dates for both Rachel and Ross, hoping that appreciation of their former relationship will push them back together. Meanwhile, the ovulating Monica wants to get intimate with Chandler.

programme.title: Definitely, Maybe
programme.desc: Young Maya pesters her dad to tell her why hes getting divorced, so he tells her the story of his (love) life. Has he missed out on his soulmate?

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Joey stumbles upon a way to impress a famous actor during an audition, Ross learns the identity of a long-ago mugger, and Chandler accepts an internship at a shoe company.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Boob Job
programme.desc: Monica secretly asks Joey for a loan because she and Chandler are strapped for cash, Phoebe invites her boyfriend to move in with her, and Rachels apartment baby-proofing drives Joey crazy.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One With the Memorial Service
programme.desc: When Chandler jokingly posts an outrageous biography about Ross on Ross college alumni website, Ross retaliates in kind, sparking an internet war. Meanwhile, Monica gets extremely vigilant after a weak-willed Phoebe asks for help to stop her from contacting Mike after their relationship ends.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Hoping to win a huge jackpot, the friends pool their money and buy dozens of lottery tickets, but they argue over how to spend the fortune if they win, and Monica irritates everyone else by buying tickets just for her and Chandler. Exasperated, Phoebe takes the bowl of everyones tickets and threatens to throw it off the balcony. The others make up, but a pigeon startles Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: The gang heads to Barbados for a palaeontology convention where Ross is the keynote speaker. Rachel harbours steamy thoughts about Joey while David prepares to propose to Phoebe.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One After Joey and Rachel Kiss
programme.desc: While the friends are still in Barbados, Joey tries to tell Ross about his feelings for Rachel and Ross wants to confess to kissing Joeys girlfriend Charlie, but it is easier said than done. Meanwhile, Monica, Chandler and Phoebe can hear their amorous conversations through the hotels paper-thin walls. Also, Monicas hair problems go from bad to worse, and Phoebe has some bad news for Mikes girlfriend on her birthday.

programme.title: Friends
programme.sub-title: The One Where Ross Is Fine
programme.desc: Ross drinks too much wine while dining with Rachel, Joey and Charlie. Elsewhere, Frank Jr cannot cope with his precocious triplets and pays Phoebe a visit.

programme.title: Friends
programme.desc: Rachel and Joey nervously anticipate their first real date, Monica and Phoebe try to avoid an obnoxious friend with a fake British accent, and Ross emerges from a tanning booth with a two-toned appearance.

programme.title: The Bad Education Movie
programme.desc: An incompetent teacher leads his class of loudmouths and rejects on a disastrous field trip to Cornwall.

programme.desc: Farmtruck and AZN find local racers to compete for $5,000 and the chance to go head-to-head with a street outlaw.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: Mike discovers a true Japanese legend from the 1990s, the Nissan 300ZX twin turbo. It comes with all the aftermarket kit you might expect, which gets Ant thinking of upping the performance even more.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers
programme.desc: A 1979 Jeep CJ-7 Renegade rolls into the workshop, but its rusted out. Ant repairs the damage, while Mike revives its tired faux-denim stonewashed upholstery.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: While the Raneys are building their family homestead in the Alaskan wilderness, a bear encounter sends them predator proofing. Later, they rush to help a family in need.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: Embarking on a new season of saving homesteads in peril, the Raneys look back on some of their most ingenious builds .They unpack their techniques, examine off-grid financial savings and reveal the all-time, fan-favourite build.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys explore their most epic rescues, counting down to the five most hostile and dangerous states that present the most gruelling challenges for new homesteaders.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: With just three days to preserve the legacy of a fourth-generation Alaskan homesteading family, the Raneys must fix an earthquake-ravaged foundation and revive a dormant garden before hitting the lower 48 for another year of incredible rescues.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys have traversed America saving homesteaders on the verge of failing and look back on the homesteads they saved.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: During a wild, unprecedented year, the Raneys visit a homestead they helped save more than three years ago and check in with other homesteads that have flourished in the months since the Raneys rescue.

programme.title: Scrap Kings
programme.desc: The M4 is closed so diggers can demolish a bridge. Accidents pile up as scrapped engines in scrap vans are raced into oblivion in a final demolition derby.

programme.title: Homestead Rescue
programme.desc: The Raneys help an Oregon couple with a toxic salt water well. Marty builds a massive catchment pond and Matt works on a solar still to decontaminate the water.

programme.title: Sin City Tow
programme.desc: At a call on the Strip, tow truck driver Shawn is shocked by a six-foot python in a cars front seat. TW tangles with a motel customer twice his size.

programme.title: Wheeler Dealers World Tour
programme.desc: Mike and Elvis are going global. This time, the stakes are higher, the deadlines tighter and the motor transformations are more jaw-dropping than ever.

programme.title: Roadworthy Rescues
programme.desc: Derek heads to Minnesota to revive a dirt track car hes had stashed away for years. It was a legend in its heyday, but with the car currently in pieces, hell need the help of some skilled friends if hes going to bring his vision back to life.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid
programme.desc: Naked and Afraid legend Steven Lee Hall Jr. joins two first-time survivalists for 21 days in the brutal backwoods of Kentucky. Its deadly copperheads and violent storms push even the King of the Forest to his breaking point.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid
programme.desc: A wounded adventurer and a cautious newlywed attempt to survive 21 days in the remote Philippine wilderness. Tormented by fire ants, stitches and extreme hunger, their ability to endure is pushed to the brink.

programme.title: Naked and Afraid
programme.desc: A military veteran with a crippling fear of snakes and a Canadian cattle rancher try to survive 21 days in the unforgiving Philippine jungle. A mystery visitor torments them nightly; wracked with hunger, they attempt to trap it.

programme.title: Buying Alaska
programme.desc: Kevin and Katelynn have toured all over Alaska, but they continue to go back to the hillside town of Eagle River, rustic mountain-living close to Anchorage.

programme.title: Buying Alaska

programme.desc: The boys are back in Alaska (although Discovery dropped the states mention in the title after the first season) hoping to strike it rich mining for gold. Their first effort was anything but rich and glorious, however, as the crew led by Todd Hoffman and his father, Jack, sunk $250,000 into their dream and came away with just $20,000 worth of gold. The dismal summer was filled with injuries, malfunctioning equipment and constant fighting among the greenhorn miners, yet their serious case of gold fever trumps any talk of giving up and leads to a new operating plan in order to salvage their dream. programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Flamangos in rural Whitehouse, New Jersey. Mother and daughter owners Adele and Cheryl are stuck in their tropical ways but their restaurant is far from paradise. They are in deep financial trouble and Adele struggles to get on with her staff, is disappointed by her chef and hates Gordon with a passion. Gordon has one last chance to bring them all around and make the restaurant a success.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Bazzini restaurant in Ridgewood, New Jersey. Owner Paul Bazzini was an award-winning chef in New York who decided to run his own restaurant but he never realised how difficult the change would be. Now, he finds everyday tasks overwhelming and his passion for food is in danger of being extinguished by the daily grind. However, passion isnt the only problem in this failing restaurant.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Mojito, a Cuban cafe in Brooklyn, New York. Owners Marcelo and Kata used to be married to each other but now fight over everything. Seven years ago, the couple were happy newlyweds and the restaurant was their shared dream, but now the passion has gone and theyre constantly at each others throats, with their staff getting caught in the crossfire.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon travels to Queens, New York to visit PJs Steakhouse, a restaurant he quickly discovers is all sizzle and no steak. Owners Joe and Madalyn have found themselves in serious debt after opening the high-end restaurant. The couple were overcome by grief when Joes brother PJ passed away. Struggling to move on they decided to take over the lease of PJs bar and turn it into a restaurant.

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon visits Fleming, a Danish restaurant in Miami, Florida. It was once the best family-run restaurant in town, but now the place is on its last legs. Fleming was bought by husband and wife team Andy and Suzanne eight years ago, in the hope of continuing the restaurants past success, but with no clue about Danish cuisine its no real surprise the place is losing money. Can Gordon save their bacon?

programme.title: Ramsays Kitchen Nightmares USA
programme.desc: Gordon Ramsay pays a visit to 3 Southern Girls. a traditional southern cuisine restaurant. The restaurants owners hope to rebuild a successful business after being forced to close down for more than a month due to a family tragedy.

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: Impractical Jokers

programme.title: How I Met Your Mother

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me

programme.desc: John and his fiancee Jackie live in Kirkintilloch, an old mining town on the outskirts of Glasgow. Country boy John was born there and has never left, but city girl Jackie hails from Glasgows West End and has always dreamt of a sophisticated and glamorous wedding. John has his head in the clouds for his brides big day and wants to throw Jackie out of a plane at 10,000 feet on the morning of her wedding.

programme.title: Dont Tell the Bride
programme.desc: Luke, 22, and Alex, 25, met ten months ago when working on Ibiza. Despite not being together for very long, they knew they are made for each other. So after just six months, Luke decided to propose. Money is tight, but this hasnt stopped Alex dreaming of a traditional wedding, surrounded by all her friends and family. However, Luke has got very different ideas and tries to pull off the best Ibiza wedding ever.

Paul hops across the estuary to taste the award-winning oysters produced by Porthilly Farm, a five-generation family-run dairy farm who diversified into oysters, and James uses some in his individual beef pies with oysters.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by Michelin-starred chef Kenny Atkinson, and they set out to sample the delights of Northumberland. They learn how mead is made on Holy Island, before James cooks up a Singapore-inspired crab and lobster dish on a stunning beach, and they both enjoy a Puffin cruise at Cockett Island. Theres a trip to a lobster hatchery too, before James cooks local speciality Singing Hinnies on another breathtaking beach.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined by Michelin-starred chef Lisa Goodwin-Allen for a visit to the Isle of Man during the famous TT race warm-up week. James serves up proper biker food, pork burgers with a spicy apple sauce, while Lisa visits local organic juice producers. James picks up some local Manx kippers and makes a delicious soup, before meeting TT legend John McGuinness. Finally, he treats John and his team to some tasty lamb chops with hispi cabbage and an olive glaze.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James is joined in Northern Ireland by his good pal and local boy Paul Rankin. They brave the Carrick-a-Rede rope bridge together, then James cooks a tasty fish dish with the dramatic coastline as his backdrop. Theres a fishing trip over to Rathlin Island on the menu too, where James tastes some dishes made from the local kelp. James and Paul then visit the Old Lammas Fair, where they taste some of the delicious seafood.

programme.title: James Martins Islands to Highlands
programme.desc: James returns to Northern Ireland with his old chef buddy Paul Rankin, where theyre exploring the area around Lough Neagh, the biggest freshwater lake in the British Isles. James and Paul discover a wasabi farm, a rarity outside of Japan. Next, Paul visits an old friend, a local honey producer, while James cooks overlooking the dramatic backdrop of Slieve Gullion: the highest point in Armagh.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Mother and son Martine and Remi are searching for a holiday home along the beautiful Charente coast on the island of Oleron in France. Ben Hillman is on hand with five properties.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Laura Hamilton is house-hunting around Limoges with Gary and Maggie from Norfolk. Theyre looking for a place to retire to thats big enough for the family, which includes 13 grandchildren.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Shami and Clive share a love of Sicily and cant wait to find a place where they can eventually relocate to with their three cats. Scarlette Douglas uses all her skills to help.

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: Gary and Carol from Kent first fell in love with rural Aquitaine in France on holiday and now want to make it their permanent home, so theyre calling on the help of expert Laura Hamilton.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: This competition is in and around Birmingham, and first host, 53-year-old personal assistant and self-proclaimed domestic goddess Lisa is serving a menu channelling her Malaysian roots.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is day two in Birmingham, and 37-year-old shopping channel producer Martha is hoping to educate - as well as entertain - her guests with a fully vegan feast. She hopes her vegetable extravaganza will win her the cash prize.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Flexing his culinary credentials on the third night in Birmingham is 46-year-old Mark, and his menu of classic comfort food. Will his food hit the spot and win fellow diner Marthas vote?

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: It is day four in and around Birmingham, and 30-year-old youth worker Sonia is serving a selection of restaurant favourites. She hopes her menu will tickle her guests taste buds and not leave a nasty taste in their mouths.

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Its the final day in Birmingham, and 32-year-old aquarium designer Akil hopes to create a splash, with a homemade seafood tempura to start and sea bass and scallops for the main.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandB battle begins at Michael and Danielles Fountain Cottage in Bellingham, Northumberland. The hosts are hoping their award-winning cafe will give them the edge, but its a trip to a local brewery that really gets the guests in high spirits.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Visit two takes the BandBers to The Shuckburgh Arms in Stoke Doyle, Northamptonshire. Everyone goes barmy for their converted barns, but one guest isnt buzzing about a broken fridge disturbing his slumber.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: The BandBers are in Great Yarmouth for the weeks third visit, at Stu and Lous Beachside Holidays. No ones arguing with the stunning sea views and the location right on the beach, but the hosts take some flack for the lack of a welcome pack.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its the final visit of the week, and the BandBers are down the rabbit hole at the Alice in Wonderland-themed Hatters Hotel in Skegness. Dee and Gary reckon their unique BandB experience will have their guests grinning like Cheshire cats.

programme.title: Four in a Bed
programme.desc: Its payment day, and time for the BandBers to settle some scores. After some dramatic discoveries, the BandBers find out how much theyve been paid, and the winners are announced.

programme.title: Surgeons: Life in Their Hands
programme.desc: Robert is contemplating brain surgery. Former truck driver Gary is gearing up for yet another medical procedure to address complications arising from a lifetime of sun exposure. A deep cut in backpacker Rubys hand needs immediate attention.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: This episode examines the paths people take when they reach a crossroads in their lives. Dave has fallen from a ladder. Three-year-old Alf has been hit by a car.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE
programme.desc: Paul, who is 60, has been in a collision with a van. Also, four-year-old Jeremy is struggling to breathe and he has a series of chronic conditions including microcephaly and epilepsy.

programme.title: Surgeons: Life in Their Hands
programme.desc: Robert is contemplating brain surgery. Former truck driver Gary is gearing up for yet another medical procedure to address complications arising from a lifetime of sun exposure. A deep cut in backpacker Rubys hand needs immediate attention.

programme.title: 999: On the Front Line
programme.desc: Paramedics treat a woman whos in pain after giving birth a week ago. A man who fell has pain in his side and is having difficulty breathing. And a mum calls 999 after her toddler whos been ill for several days proves difficult to wake.

programme.title: 24 Hours in AandE

programme.desc: Amber, Chloe and Mia have very different Valentines Day experiences, Megan has her baby shower and Sassi and Darren reach breaking point. It must be another all new episode of Teen Mom UK.

programme.title: Teen Mom OG
programme.desc: For four seasons fans of `Teen Mom watched Farrah, Maci, Amber and Catelynn face multiple challenges in their first years of motherhood, including such things as graduating from high school, relationships, getting jobs, beginning college and moving out on their own. Oh, and raising their first child. Now the original girls - hence, the `OG in the revived series title - return to reveal the challenges of raising children on camera, and how life in the public eye has shaped them as parents and people. Its an unprecedented view of young mothers facing the responsibilities of parenthood as their children enter kindergarten, start little league and reach other milestones of youth.

programme.desc: Toy restorers Amanda and Julie have their work cut out reviving a sad dog that has been badly burned in a devastating house fire. programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Being a mum is a massive part of Motherland star Anna Maxwell Martins life. She is interested in what kinds of parents there were in the family before her, and how this has shaped her own life and the kind of parent she is to her daughters. Travelling to the small town in Northern Ireland where her father grew up, her understanding of her grandparents - who suffered a heartbreaking family tragedy - is turned on its head.

programme.title: Who Do You Think You Are?
programme.desc: Andrew Lloyd Webber is a global superstar of musical theatre, still writing and producing blockbuster shows. He has also combined his nose for business with his love of architecture by renovating the Theatre Royal Drury Lane to its original condition. Andrew knows he comes from a musical family, including virtuoso cellist brother, Julian - but hed love to find out where his showbiz genes and his love of musical theatre come from.

programme.title: Long Lost Family: What Happened Next

programme.title: A Place in the Sun

programme.desc: An apocalyptic story set in the furthest reaches of our planet, in a stark desert landscape where humanity is broken. Two rebels on the run may be able to restore order.

programme.title: Jack Reacher
programme.desc: A defence attorney hires an enigmatic ex-Army investigator to tackle the case of a highly trained sniper who apparently murdered five people at random.

programme.title: Jack Reacher: Never Go Back
programme.desc: Investigator Jack Reacher goes on the lam to uncover the truth behind a major government conspiracy that involves the death of U.S. soldiers.

programme.title: Crank
programme.desc: An ex-hit man is injected with a mysterious cocktail of drugs by his arch-rival that will kill him if his heart rate drops below a certain level. programme.title: LEGO DC Comics Super Heroes: Justice League vs. Bizarro League
programme.desc: Superman, Batman and the rest of the Justice League team up with the Bizarro League to defeat Darkseid.

programme.title: Curious George
programme.desc: Curious George is an inquisitive little monkey with an insatiable taste for adventure. Georges fun-loving enthusiastic nature endears him to new friends, but also lands him in a series of misadventures.

programme.title: Tom and Jerry: Cowboy Up!
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry are in the Wild West where they help save a ranch from the hands of a greedy villain. The rivals team up to help a cowgirl and her brother save their homestead from a greedy land-grabber.

programme.title: Madagascar
programme.desc: Spoiled by their upbringing and with no idea of what wildlife is really like, Alex the lion, Marty the zebra and hypochondriac giraffe Melman swap New York Central Zoo for madcap Madagascar, on a journey to find their friend.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania
programme.desc: Dracula, who operates a high-end resort away from the human world, goes into overprotective mode when a boy discovers the resort and falls for the counts teen-aged daughter.

programme.title: Despicable Me 4
programme.desc: Gru welcomes a new member to the family, Gru Jr., whos intent on tormenting his dad. However, their peaceful existence soon comes crashing down when criminal mastermind Maxime Le Mal escapes from prison and vows revenge against Gru.

programme.title: The Boss Baby
programme.desc: A wildly imaginative seven-year-old boy discovers that his new brother, Boss Baby, is actually a spy on a secret mission, and only he can help thwart a dastardly plot that involves an epic battle between puppies and babies.

programme.title: Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa
programme.desc: The sequel to `Madagascar, in which New York Zoo animals, Alex the Lion, Marty the Zebra, Melman the Giraffe and Gloria the Hippo, still stranded on Madagascar, start to leave the island. All of a sudden, they land in the wilderness of Africa, where Alex meets the rest of his family, but has trouble communicating with them after spending so much time at the Central Park Zoo.

programme.title: Small Foot
programme.desc: Migo is a friendly Yeti who discovers something that he didnt know existed: a human. When his fellow villagers refuse to believe him, Migo embarks on an epic journey to find the mysterious creature that can put him back in good graces.

programme.title: Hotel Transylvania 2
programme.desc: Concerned that his half-human grandson isnt showing his vampire side, Dracula and his friends put the boy through a `monster-in-training boot camp just as Dracs old-school father decides to pay a visit.

programme.title: Over the Hedge
programme.desc: An opportunistic raccoon teaches fellow animals about the edible treasures that the new humans in the neighbourhood conveniently leave outdoors.

programme.title: Turbo
programme.desc: A snail gets the chance to escape his slow-paced life and race in the Indianapolis 500 when a freak accident gives him the power of superspeed.

programme.title: Rugrats in Paris: The Movie
programme.desc: The Rugrats are in Paris where Chuckies widowed father has been called on to mend an animated monster in a theme park, but its all a ploy by Coco LaBouche - the parks head, to get appointed head of a major company. As she and her henchman Jean-Claude plan to ensnare him, only the rest of the Rugrats can stop him falling for her charms.

programme.title: Barnyard
programme.desc: Otis the cow is a wild-living party animal and just loves to dance until dawn, but then his dad is killed by coyotes, and Otis has to become the responsible leader of the rest of the all-singing, all-dancing farm animals.

programme.title: The Road to El Dorado
programme.desc: Two rogues stumble across a map of the treasures of El Dorado and stow away on an explorers ship bound for South America, where they are mistaken for gods due to their foreign complexions. Narrated by Elton John, who provided the music to Tim Rices lyrics.

programme.title: The Wild Thornberrys Movie
programme.desc: A feature-length spin-off from the TV series, the Thornberry family - led by natural history film-maker Colonel Radcliff Thornberry - head to deepest Africa. Once there, daughter Eliza - after meeting a shaman - can talk to the animals, a skill that stands her in good stead to foil a dastardly plot by poachers to kill a herd of elephants for their ivory.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.title: David Brent: Life on the Road
programme.desc: David Brent is on tour with his band `Forgone Conclusion. However, tickets sales are not enough to keep the band afloat so Brent has to dip into his pension. Meanwhile, he is being filmed for what he believes will be a documentary, like Martin Scorsese did with The Rolling Stones, but it if for a `where are they now style documentary.

programme.title: Housesitter
programme.desc: Newton Davis builds a dream home for his childhood sweetheart and is promptly dumped. Devastated, he seeks solace in the arms of a waitress, but sneaks off into the night once hes had his fun. The spurned waitress exacts her revenge by moving into the empty house and masquerading as Newtons wife. At this stage, things start getting complicated.

programme.title: Scott Pilgrim vs. the World
programme.desc: Scott Pilgrim plays bass guitar in a struggling Toronto-based band and pines after his ex-girlfriend, now a success in her own band. At a party he meets Ramona Flowers and instantly is smitten, but in his pursuit of her he is attacked by Matthew Patel who informs Scott that he is the first of seven evil exes that Scott will have to defeat in order to win Ramona.

programme.title: The Holdovers
programme.desc: Forced to spend Christmas break with a handful of students, a curmudgeonly instructor at a New England prep school develops an unlikely bond with a brainy troublemaker and the head cook.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Ted
programme.desc: When John Bennett was a little boy, he made a wish that Ted, his beloved teddy bear, would come alive. Thirty years later, foul-mouthed Ted is still Johns constant companion, much to the chagrin of Lori, Johns girlfriend. Though Loris displeasure is exacerbated by the pairs constant consumption of beer and weed, shes not the one whos most disappointed with John; it may take the intervention of Johns boyhood toy to help him grow up at last.

programme.title: Ted 2
programme.desc: Teddy bear Ted seeks legal help from a young lawyer and a legendary, civil-rights attorney when the law declares him to be property and not a person.

programme.title: The Hangover
programme.desc: A crazy Las Vegas bachelor party turns into a race against time when three hung-over groomsmen awaken after a night of drunken debauchery to find that the groom has gone missing, and attempt to get him to the alter in time for his wedding.

programme.title: The Hangover Part II
programme.desc: A group of friends go to Thailand for a quiet and restrained stag party, but are dismayed to wake up in a mysterious hotel room, with a man missing and no memory of the night before. Of course, Alan manages to get himself in with the crowd.

programme.title: The Hangover Part III
programme.desc: Phil, Stu and Doug take Alan on a road trip to help him through a personal crisis.

programme.title: Love Actually
programme.desc: Weaving in and out of the love lives of eight loosely inter-related couples. The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

The bachelor Prime Minister falls for his personal assistant, his brother-in-law is flirting with one of his colleagues, a writer heads off to France and pursues an affair with a maid, and an 11-year-old boy asks his father for advice on matters of the heart.

programme.title: Kangaroo Jack
programme.desc: Two childhood friends get caught up in with the mob in New York and find themselves forced to travel to Australia to deliver $50,000. Their trouble really starts when they reach the outback, and a kangaroo bounds away with the cash.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Parenthood
programme.desc: An over-protective dad, determined to do a better job than his own distant father, anxiously dotes on his troubled eight-year-old son. His brother, meanwhile, strives to mould his toddler daughter into an academic high-flyer, and his sister struggles with two rebellious, angst-ridden teenagers.

programme.title: Fifty Shades of Grey
programme.desc: An inexperienced student begins a daring affair with a controlling businessman whose sexual proclivities push the boundaries of pain and pleasure.

programme.title: The Boy in the Striped Pyjamas
programme.desc: When his fathers job results in a family move to the countryside, young German boy Bruno misses his old friends. Roaming the grounds of the large country house he now calls home, he discovers the huge fenced facility that his dad Ralf, a Nazi officer, now manages. Approaching it, Bruno meets Shmuel, a fellow youngster on the other side of the barbed wire, wearing what appears to be a pair of pyjamas.

programme.title: Elizabeth: The Golden Age
programme.desc: Elizabeth might have her royal rival Mary Queen of Scots in custody, but a far greater threat lies to the east: the Spanish Armada. Despite her reign of 30 years, Elizabeths hold on the English throne remains uncertain. Her kingdom lies in the shadow of mighty Spain, Philip IIs vast army and the Inquisition, but Elizabeth is undaunted.

programme.title: A League of Their Own
programme.desc: Based on a true story, this film, set during World War II, tells the story of the all-female baseball league that was started while the American men were away fighting in Europe. After a team of potential players has been recruited, former player Jimmy Dugan coaches the girls and prepares them for the World Series.

programme.title: Sleepless in Seattle
programme.desc: A recently engaged woman becomes obsessed with meeting the grieving widower she heard on a late night radio show. Sam, the widower, receives hundreds of letters following the radio phone-in which was instigated by his son Jonah.

programme.title: Dunkirk
programme.desc: Germany advances into France, trapping Allied troops on the beaches of Dunkirk. Under air and ground cover from British and French forces, troops are slowly and methodically evacuated from the beach using every vessel that can be found.

programme.title: There Will Be Blood
programme.desc: Ruthless silver miner, turned oil prospector, Daniel Plainview moves to oil-rich California. Using his adopted son HW to project a trustworthy, family-man image, Plainview cons local landowners into selling him their valuable properties for a pittance. However, local preacher Eli Sunday suspects Plainviews motives and intentions, starting a slow-burning feud that threatens both their lives.

programme.title: One Life
programme.desc: The story of British humanitarian Nicholas Winton, who helped save hundreds of predominantly Jewish children from the Nazis on the eve of World War II.

programme.title: Bob Marley: One Love
programme.desc: Jamaican singer-songwriter Bob Marley overcomes adversity to become the most famous reggae musician in the world.

programme.title: Dreamgirls
programme.desc: Following the adventures of The Dreamettes, an all-girl singing group. Theyre going nowhere fast until they meet fast-talking car salesman-come-manager who has ambitions to make a fortune selling black music to a white audience. He persuades them to become backing singers for James `Thunder Early, but the larger-than-life lead singer Effie White must step out of the spotlight in favour of the more image-friendly Deena Jones.

programme.title: The Holiday
programme.desc: Dumped and depressed, English rose Iris agrees to swap homes with similarly unlucky in love Californian Amanda for a much-needed break. Iris finds herself in a palatial Hollywood mansion while Amanda navigates the lanes of a picture-perfect English village. Soon enough, both lovelorn ladies bump into local lads perfect for a romantic pick-me-up.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Fifty Shades Darker
programme.desc: Shadowy figures from Christian Greys past threaten to destroy his rekindled romance with Anastasia Steele.

programme.title: Friend or Foe
programme.desc: WWII evacuee David hates the Germans, but now his life has been saved by one. What is the right thing to do, tell the Army or offer his help?

programme.title: Finding Neverland
programme.desc: Its London in 1904, and writer JM Barrie is inspired by a family he meets, mother Sylvia and her four children, Peter, Jack, George and Michael. From the time he spends with them, he writes the famous childrens novel `Peter Pan.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire
programme.desc: The Spenglers return to the New York City firehouse where the original Ghostbusters have taken ghost-busting to the next level. When the discovery of an ancient artefact unleashes an evil force, Ghostbusters new and old must unite to save the world.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Too
programme.desc: A wisecracking toddler deals with toilet training, bickering parents and a baby sister in this sequel to the 1989 hit.

programme.title: The Huntsman: Winters War
programme.desc: A huntsman and a fellow warrior help an ice queen battle the evil sister who betrayed her.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: Out of the Shadows
programme.desc: The turtles spring into action to battle Shredder, mad scientist Baxter Stockman, Bebop, Rocksteady and the notorious Krang.

programme.title: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
programme.desc: Four unlikely warriors rise from the sewers and join forces with fearless reporter April ONeil to save New York from Shredder and his evil minions.

programme.title: The Nutty Professor
programme.desc: Professor Sherman, a 450lb scientist, falls for his new colleague Professor Carla Purty, but out on a date, hes humiliated by a nightclub comedian about his weight. Upset and depressed, he takes a potion hes only tested previously on hamsters and - hey presto - he turns into a svelte and cool-talking babe-magnet, Buddy Love.

programme.title: Nutty Professor II: The Klumps
programme.desc: Sherman is getting married to Denise Gains but his alter-ego Buddy Love keeps breaking through. Determined to rid himself of his pesky partner, he extracts Buddys genes, but an accident and a dog hair see Buddy take on his own life. Unaware of his existence, Sherman and Denise perfect their new rejuvenation formula and their fortune seems assured until Buddy steals it.

programme.title: Look Whos Talking Now
programme.desc: In the third of the `Look Whos Talking comedies, two dogs enter the Umbriacco household - and take an immediate dislike to each other. When Molly loses her job, husband James is forced to take on a demanding role as private airline pilot. The children miss him, so he buys a dog to cheer them up. However, when Jamess glamorous boss asks his family to look after her poodle, sparks fly between the dogs.

programme.title: Big Fat Liar
programme.desc: A junior high-school student and his best friend play a series of pranks on the sleazy Hollywood producer responsible for plagiarising his class essay and turning it into a hit film.

programme.title: Pups United
programme.desc: A group of talking dogs save the Youth World Cup football finals.

programme.title: The Wiz
programme.desc: In this version of the classic story - based on the smash Broadway musical - Dorothy is a shy 24-year-old Harlem kindergarten teacher who is brought by a snowstorm to the mysterious Land of Oz, a sprawling, decaying, nightmarish, and dangerous megalopolis that resembles the physical characteristics of New York City.

programme.title: Men in Black 3
programme.desc: Agent J goes back to the swinging 60s in a time-travelling mission to save his partner from a murderous alien.

programme.title: Cinema List: Thrilling Thriller
programme.desc: Send your heart racing with these masterful thrillers creating tension so thick you could cut it, from 70s hit `The China Syndrome to M Night Shyamalans 2024 blockbuster `Trap.

programme.title: Men in Black
programme.desc: The secretive Men in Black are agents charged with regulating the aliens who have settled on Earth and ensure that they remain undetected. New recruit J and his partner K must find and stop an intergalactic terrorist bent on assassinating two ambassadors from opposing galaxies before they can make peace.

programme.title: Men in Black II
programme.desc: Sequel to the sci-fi comedy about a top secret government task force set up to deal with unruly extraterrestrials. An MIB agent turns to the only man who can help him save the world from a rampaging, shape-shifting alien which has taken on the outward appearance of a sexy lingerie model.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: The Edge of Reason
programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Baby
programme.desc: Befuddled mom-to-be Bridget Jones must figure out which of the two men in her life is the father of her child.

programme.title: The Cinema List: Saturday Night
programme.desc: To celebrate the release of the film Saturday Night, join the Cinema List as we explore 50 years of hilarious films from the SNL cast - including Waynes World, Bridesmaids and more.

programme.title: Bridget Jones: Mad About the Boy
programme.desc: After jumping back into the dating pool, single mother Bridget Jones finds herself caught between a younger man and her sons science teacher.

programme.title: Bridget Joness Diary
programme.desc: A neurotic thirty-something resolves to take control of her life once and for all. She drinks, smokes and eats too much, and, worst of all, she falls for the wrong kind of man - passing over Mr Right for Mr Right Now. From the novel by Helen Fielding.

programme.desc: Bridgets brand new relationship with Darcy has taken a plummet due to her jealousy of his workmate. Having previously left the publishing house she worked for to avoid her boss, Daniel, with whom she had an unsuccessful romance, she finds him along for the ride on her new job, which takes her to Thailand, and almost into his arms.

programme.title: Spin the Bottle
programme.desc: When a group of friends play spin the bottle in a house marked by a brutal massacre, they unknowingly unleash an evil spirit and start dying in terrifying ways. The survivors must stick together to uncover the houses secrets and end the bloodshed.

programme.title: Die Alone
programme.desc: A young man with amnesia bands together with a rugged survivalist after a devastating virus causes a zombie-like outbreak.

programme.title: Wish You Were Here
programme.desc: When a perfect night with a perfect stranger ends suddenly the next morning, Charlotte searches for answers and meaning in her life. However, she soon uncovers a shocking secret that changes everything she knows about the man who captured her heart.

programme.title: Code 3
programme.desc: On his final 24-hour shift, a burned-out paramedic is tasked with training his eager but inexperienced replacement. What starts as a routine night quickly spirals into a chaotic odyssey that tests their endurance, instincts and sense of humour.

programme.desc: A clairvoyant therapist confronts her own personal demons while trying to save a young girl who believes a malevolent entity is feeding on her.

programme.title: Sky Cinema Preview
programme.desc: Previews of the great films now playing on Sky Cinema plus other highlights showing on Sky.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Timestalker
programme.desc: Hapless Agnes repeatedly falls for the wrong guy, dies a grim death, and is reincarnated a century later. As she experiences romantic misfortune through different eras of history, Agnes seeks to avoid repeat mistakes and finally break the cycle.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Restore Point
programme.desc: In 2041 central Europe, Detective Em investigates the case of a murdered couple where a restoration team brings one of them back to life.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kill
programme.desc: Three brothers return to the remote woodland where they killed their abusive father only to discover his shallow grave is now empty, forcing them to question one anothers loyalty with devastating consequences as fear and paranoia set in.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Escape From the 21st Century
programme.desc: Three friends discover they have the power to travel back and forth twenty years with a sneeze. The future is not as good as they hoped, and they need to take on the responsibility of saving the world.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: Kong: Skull Island
programme.desc: Scientists, soldiers and adventurers encounter the mighty Kong and other monstrous creatures after travelling to an uncharted island in the Pacific Ocean.

programme.channel: Sky Cinema Sci Fi and Horror HD.uk
programme.title: If You Were the Last
programme.desc: Adrift in their broken-down space shuttle with little hope of rescue, two astronauts debate whether theyre better off as friends or something more.

programme.title: Jules
programme.desc: A mans quiet life gets upended when a UFO crashes in his backyard in rural Pennsylvania. As he befriends the mysterious extraterrestrial, things start to get complicated when two neighbours discover it and the government quickly closes in.

programme.title: Godzilla x Kong: The New Empire

programme.title: A.I.: Artificial Intelligence

programme.title: Friday the 13th - Part III
programme.desc: Jason is still on the loose. While the hunt for him continues, another group of teenagers arrive at Lake Crystal. Among them is Chris, who is troubled by visions from the past where she was attacked in the woods by a deformed monster, only to awake safe in her bed. Determined to face her demons, she and her boyfriend Rick are among the group partying at the Lake but Jason is ready to exact revenge.

programme.title: The Invisible Man
programme.desc: After staging his own suicide, a crazed scientist uses his power to become invisible to stalk and terrorise his ex-girlfriend. When the police refuse to believe her story, she decides to take matters into her own hands and fight back.

programme.title: The Watched
programme.desc: A 28-year-old artist gets stranded in an expansive, untouched forest in western Ireland. Finding shelter, she unknowingly becomes trapped alongside three strangers who are stalked by mysterious creatures every night.

programme.title: Dark Skies
programme.desc: A couple and their children gather their courage and determination to combat a terrifying threat that may be from an alien force.

programme.title: Zombieland
programme.desc: Columbus and Tallahassee have orchestrated a way to survive a world overrun by zombies. With only fear keeping the `big wuss Columbus alive, Tallahassee wants to eradicate the `last Twinkie on Earth. The duo join forces with Wichita and Little Rock who have a style and tact of their own when it comes to dealing with the flesh-eating chaos.

programme.title: Annabelle
programme.desc: A possessed doll that was purchased for their new born child creates havoc, and destroys a young couples lives.

programme.title: Annabelle: Creation
programme.desc: Years after the tragic death of their daughter, a former toy maker and his wife welcome a nun and six orphaned girls into their farmhouse. Terror soon strikes when one child finds a seemingly innocent doll that appears to have a life of its own.

programme.title: The Ritual
programme.desc: Reuniting after the tragic death of their friend, four college friends set out to hike through the Scandinavian wilderness. But a wrong turn leads them into the mysterious forests of Norse legend, where an ancient evil stalks them at every turn.

programme.title: Speak No Evil
programme.desc: A dream holiday turns into a living nightmare when an American couple and their daughter spend the weekend at a British familys idyllic country estate.

programme.title: The Ring
programme.desc: US remake of the cult Japanese chiller about a journalist who faces a race against time when she investigates the legend of a strange videotape which allegedly claims the life of the viewer one week after watching it.

programme.title: The Ring Two
programme.desc: Sequel to the cult horror about a videotape that brings death to anyone who watches it. The journalist from the original film destroys the tape but is pursued by the demon that cursed it and who now wants to possess her son. The Japanese director of the original directs this sequel.

programme.title: Haunting of the Queen Mary
programme.desc: Mysterious and violent incidents occur during a familys 1938 cruise aboard the RMS Queen Mary. These events strangely connect to another familys fate on the same ocean liner in the present.

programme.title: Hollow Man
programme.desc: After years of experimentation, brilliant but arrogant scientist Sebastian Caine has discovered a way to make matter invisible. Determined to achieve the ultimate breakthrough, Caine pushes his team to move to the next phase - using himself as the subject. The test is a success, but when the process cant be reversed, Caine seems doomed to a future without flesh.

programme.title: Ouija
programme.desc: A group of friends must confront their most terrifying fears when they awaken the dark powers of an ancient spirit board.

programme.title: The Wasp
programme.desc: Based on the play by Morgan Lloyd Malcolm.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: Some Other Woman
programme.desc: Forced to give up her own dreams while living on a tropical island, Eve Carver encounters a strange woman who begins to take over her life.

programme.title: Dangerous Waters
programme.desc: A young woman, her new boyfriend and her single mother embark on a sailing adventure to Bermuda. However, when criminals suddenly attack their boat, the pleasure trip turns into a desperate fight for survival and a quest for vengeance.

programme.title: Amongst the Wolves
programme.desc: Danny, an ex-soldier homeless in Dublin, meets Will, a teen fleeing a drug gang. Their encounter forces them to confront their pasts while navigating the harsh realities they face.

programme.title: The Equalizer
programme.desc: A former commando who had faked his own death comes out of retirement to rescue a young girl from violent Russian mobsters.

programme.title: Clear and Present Danger
programme.desc: Investigating the assassination of a friend of the President, CIA agent Ryan discovers that his friend was in league with the Colombian drugs cartels. In revenge, a paramilitary force is sent in to wipe out the drug lords but when the operation goes wrong, theyre abandoned by their country. Now their only hope is Ryan and fellow renegade operative Clark.

programme.title: Dirty Harry
programme.desc: A violent and uncompromising police officer hunts for a psychopath who holds the city of San Francisco to ransom. Although the officers unorthodox methods do not endear him to his superiors, the mayor reluctantly agrees that Harry Callahan seems to be the right cop for the job.

programme.title: Inferno
programme.desc: An amnesiac symbologist and a doctor race across Europe and against time to stop a madman from unleashing a virus that could wipe out half of the worlds population.

programme.title: The Bikeriders
programme.desc: Over the course of a decade, a Midwestern motorcycle club evolves from a gathering place for local outsiders to a sinister gang, threatening the original groups way of life.

programme.title: Serpico
programme.desc: Based on the true story of policeman Frank Serpico, who sacrificed his career to expose widespread corruption in the NYPD. Going beyond the call of duty, he is rewarded for his commitment.

programme.title: Law Abiding Citizen
programme.desc: A frustrated man decides to take justice into his own hands after a plea bargain sets one of his familys killers free. He targets not only the killer but also the district attorney and others involved in the deal.

programme.title: Escape From Alcatraz
programme.desc: Fact-based story set in Americas former maximum-security prison, from which escape was supposed to be impossible. For habitual jailbreaker Frank Morris, however, Alcatraz is just another set of bars and walls that will never hold him.

programme.desc: A look at how forensic science can help police solve cold cases where the answer seems impossible.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: A look at how police used CCTV, eyewitness statements and a public appeal to find the killer of a 28-year old woman, found dead on the streets of Nottingham.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Dubbed as The Beast, Andrezej Kunowski attacked and raped 27 women before getting caught for strangling a 12-year-old girl.

programme.title: Killer In My Village
programme.desc: After the body of Frankie Fitzgerald was found in 2022, details filtered through of a toxic relationship and a fascination with serial killers harboured by the murderer who took his life.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching The Killer
programme.desc: 30 years after the gruesome murders of three women, familial DNA and the exhumation of a body finally closes the case.

programme.title: Worlds Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Responsible for five murders, Joshua Wade avoided justice for years and later confessed to killings that started from when he was just 14.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: A seemingly ordinary family man is the prime suspect when his wife, three young children and mother-in-law are brutally killed after church.

programme.title: Forensics: Catching the Killer
programme.desc: In 2022, 35-year-old Zara Aleena was beaten to death just ten minutes from her London home, but the only evidence left by her brutal killer was one bloody fingerprint at the crime scene.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: When Charlotte Murray didnt show up to spend her 34th birthday with her twin sister, their family knew something was seriously wrong.

programme.title: Murder In Slow Motion: The Shana Grice Story
programme.desc: The story of 18-year-old Shana Grice, who was murdered by her ex-boyfriend after months of persistent and terrifying stalking.

programme.title: Theres Something Wrong With Aunt Diane
programme.desc: A look into the 2009 Taconic State Parkway crash. Diane Schuler and seven other people are left dead on the parkway after Diane drives the wrong direction.

programme.title: Britains Most Evil Killers
programme.desc: Robert Howard: Across three countries, over four decades, Robert Howard preyed on vulnerable women - leaving two teenage victims dead.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight
programme.desc: While walking her dogs at a local beauty spot, Debbie Buxton is killed in a frenzied and unprovoked attack by David Bond.

programme.title: How I Caught the Killer
programme.desc: Revealing, like never before, what it is like to be a police officer working on the most incredible and inconceivable murder cases in criminal history. A look into murder cases from the first 999 call, the investigation and then the guilty verdict.

programme.title: Killer In My Village
programme.desc: In 2008, the quiet village of Duddleswell found itself rocked when a dog walker discovered the body of missing television make-up artist Diane Chenery-Wickens, setting off a police investigation to unmask the murderer.

programme.title: Murdered At First Sight
programme.desc: Most killers know their victims but recently there has been an alarming rise in stranger murders. This is the shocking stories of people who were killed by someone they had never met.

programme.title: The Loneliest Whale
programme.desc: The mysterious 52 Hertz whale emits a call unrecognized by other whales, leading to a life of solitude.

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice is in Lincoln, getting to grips with life in medieval England. She visits the magnificent cathedral that was once the tallest building in the world and re-lives the battle at Lincoln Castle.

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: Alice is in London, as she attempts to make sense of the world-changing events during the short but eventful Restoration period. She learns the violent and vengeful truth behind Charles IIs carefully crafted public image.

programme.title: Britains Most Historic Towns
programme.desc: In Portsmouth, Alice Roberts learns about Nelsons dark side, the heat of the battle at Trafalgar, the role of the Navy in the British Empire, and the lives of sex workers.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts explores some of this years most exciting archaeological finds from the east of Britain. Each discovery comes straight from the trenches/site, filmed by the archaeologists themselves. We unearth the biggest collection of Roman writing tablets in Britain, giving insight into what Roman London was really like.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Alice discovers the well-preserved writing tablets, swords and domestic items left by Romans at Vindolanda during a time of British rebellion. On the Scottish island of Iona, there are traces of a long-lost monastery and pilgrimage site that was originally built by the legendary Saint Columba, and has been compared to Jerusalem. In the east of Scotland, a weapons hoard belonging to a wealthy Bronze Age warrior is unearthed.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Alice Roberts follows the excavation of Iron Age Britains most spectacular grave. A team of archaeologists in East Yorkshire have uncovered the remains of only the third upright chariot burial ever found in Britain, and the only chariot burial ever found in this country with the chariot harnessed to two standing ponies. This sensational find is the lead dig for the Digging for Britain Iron Age special.

programme.title: Digging for Britain
programme.desc: Professor Alice Roberts explores 2018s most exciting archaeological finds. In this programme Alice investigates archaeological discoveries from the west of the UK.

programme.title: The Abyss - Rise and Fall of the Nazis

programme.title: The Abyss - Rise and Fall of the Nazis
programme.desc: Hitler appears to be eliminated after his failed putsch in 1923. Discover how the Nazi movement used democracys tolerance in Germany to come back.
