programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Dr Amanda removes a sable antelopes tracking collar and the animal-care team help a flea-riddled baby vervet monkey find a new mom, free two orphaned serval cats, and follow 20 yellow baboons into their new enclosure.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Dr Amandas team loses a pangolin abused by wildlife traffickers, but another is released post-rehab. Checking on a trio of hedgehogs and tag along as the centres baboons and nyala antelopes get a change of scenery.

programme.title: Malawi Wildlife Rescue
programme.desc: Dr Amanda attempts to collar a wild roan antelope. Later, she chase down a blue monkey while unrest ensues among the vervets. She examines an eagle owl with bumblefoot and says goodbye to Sheila the croc who isheaded back to the wild.

programme.title: Ocean Parks
programme.desc: Deep in the South Caribbean Sea, explore the protected waters of Bonaire National Marine Park, home to thriving reefs, endangered sea turtles, sprawling mangroves, and a plethora of marine life.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: Dr Alison Cronin and animal manager Jeremy return from a trip to Argentina with Sasha and Kangoo, two chimpanzees are given a new home at the park, and Tuans orangutans receive a treat.

programme.title: Monkey Life
programme.desc: There are plenty of comings and goings at the park as a marmoset family heads to a new home, Tya returns looking for love, and the Barn Woollies welcome baby Xenia to their tight-knit group.

programme.title: Rooted
programme.desc: In the grasslands of southern Kalahari stands a 200 year old Acacia. In this arid landscape the Camelthorn is a sanctuary for big and small. Sociable weavers, Bruchid beetles and various mammals make use of this iconic tree.

programme.title: My Best Friends An Animal
programme.desc: Embrace an invasive nutria who has become part of the family, paddle around with Gumbo the goose, visit a blind hedgehog and his human chum, explore a swimmers bond with wild grey seals, and hang out with Cosima the monkey and Jasper the serval.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: Non-native species have made their way into the Wild Wild East and staked their claim to the jagged coast. At White Point Beach Resort in Liverpool, Nova Scotia bunnies have hopped on in for an extended holiday.

programme.title: Wild Wild East
programme.desc: In the woodland caribou of Gros Morne, the changing seasons offer a stern test for the wildlife. Even the arctic-ready muskoxen of north Quebec is challenged to find food in the whitest terrain.

programme.title: Irelands Wild Islands with Eoin Warner
programme.desc: Eoin visits a wondrous native woodland on Clare Island and as he sails his Galway Hooker through Connemaras turquoise waters he finds deserted islands home to skylarks and on the Aran Islands, Irelands only native reptile.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Great Indian Railway Journeys
programme.desc: Guided by his Bradshaws 1913 Handbook of Indian, Foreign and Colonial Travel, Michael Portillo embarks on a classic rail journey from Amritsar to Shimla. Along the way he helps to feed the thousands at the worlds largest free kitchen and travels the railway routes used by millions of migrants during Partition. He gives his trademark colourful wardrobe an Indian twist.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Series following a group of trawler fishermen in Peterhead, Scotland. Prawn boat Amity is in the grip of a winter storm, 100 miles from shore, with its nets caught on the seabed. Skipper Jimmy Buchan and his crew battle to save the boat and themselves. Elsewhere, a rival prawn trawler is filling its nets. Skippered by the young and ambitious James West, Fruitful Bough is one of the most successful boats in Peterhead.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Jimmy Buchan, skipper of the prawn trawler Amity, has just hours to decide whether to run through a storm to Peterhead or try and ride it out. Fruitful Bough, another prawn boat, is also wondering what to do - face the mountainous seas and gale force winds or lose vital fishing time by taking shelter in the Shetland Islands? Away from the storm, the whitefish boat Ocean Venture isnt catching any valuable haddock.

programme.title: Trawlermen
programme.desc: Ocean Venture has headed north and is fishing at `The Edge, only 150 miles south of the Arctic Circle. Having failed to catch enough fish, skipper John Buchan is taking a huge risk in the deep and treacherous waters of the North Atlantic in a bid to find the perfect catch. With the previous nights storm over, Amity gets back to the business of trying to catch prawns.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A classic car fan with a love of the Jaguar E-Type reluctantly sends his dream car to auction, hoping to buy a motorhome. Two Ford Escorts get Daves pulse racing.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A widow reluctantly parts with her husbands treasured collection of Rolls Royces and Bentleys, and an impulse buyer finds one of the cars a new home.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Jacks off to East Yorkshire for an iconic 80s motor, where a Ford enthusiast is thinning out his herd of nine Escorts.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Gus and Will are on the hunt for an affordable Italian car. They find an Alfa Romeo 155 hiding in a barn, so making space for an inspection proves a challenge.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.sub-title: To the Ends of the Earth
programme.desc: David Attenborough travels to the ends of the earth on an extraordinary journey across the polar regions of our planet. The Arctic and Antarctic are the greatest and least known wildernesses of all - magical ice worlds inhabited by the most bizarre and hardy creatures on earth. At the North Pole, the sun returns after six months of darkness. A pair of courting polar bears reveal a surprisingly tender side.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: After months of darkness the sun returns. The landscape is dynamically transformed and millions of migrants join the hardy residents as they find mates and begin to breed.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: It is high summer in the polar regions, and the sun never sets. Vast hordes of summer visitors cram a lifetime of drama into one long, magical day; they must feed, fight and rear their young in this brief window of plenty. Summer is a tough time for the polar bear family, as their ice world melts away and the cubs take their first swimming lesson.

programme.title: Frozen Planet
programme.desc: Polar landscapes in autumn are transformed as the big freeze returns. Most animals leave on epic journeys, some now battle to breed, and for the hardy few its a time of opportunity. In the Arctic, polar bears gather in large numbers on the coast to wait for the return of the ice. Tempers soon fray and violent contests break out. Off the coast 2,000 beluga whales head for a special estuary, a gigantic `whale spa.

programme.title: Ireland with Simon Reeve
programme.desc: Simon begins his journey in the south of Ireland, para-motoring with an Irish explorer. On the west coast he does spot of surfing, before climbing Croagh Patrick in honour of Irelands patron saint. This leg of his journey ends in Malin Head, Irelands most northerly point.

programme.title: Flipping Bangers
programme.desc: Gus and Will are on the hunt for an affordable Italian car. They find an Alfa Romeo 155 hiding in a barn, so making space for an inspection proves a challenge.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Jacks off to East Yorkshire for an iconic 80s motor, where a Ford enthusiast is thinning out his herd of nine Escorts.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Anglophile Derek struggles to get his message across on a rare trip abroad to pick up a Bentley, while a well-restored Ford XR2 sets the auction alight.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Dave finds a very rare 70s Sunbeam Lotus that has been rotting away in a farmyard for 29 years, while a Morris Minor convertible goes under the hammer.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: A delightful collection of British classics comes up for auction, including an Austin A35 and a Hillman Avenger Estate in stunning condition. An E-Type Jaguar also hits the auction.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash
programme.desc: Three MGs from the 70s turn up at the garage, still covered in original factory wax. Nobody can believe it, or value them. A Morris 1000 turns up at the auction along with a TR7 V8.

programme.title: Bangers and Cash: Restoring Classics
programme.desc: The team buy one of Dereks favourite Austin commercials and convert it to electric, and also snap up a super-rare 50s American beach bike.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Teleshopping
programme.desc: Shopping from home.

programme.title: Shaadi Karke Phas Gaya Yaar
programme.desc: Ayaan tricks a model into marrying him, when she leaves her diary in his familys garage, allowing him to follow her around.

programme.title: Mission Mangal
programme.desc: The real-life story of the Indian Space Research Organisations Mars Orbiter Mission which made Mars more accessible to explore.

programme.title: Pyar Koi Khel Nahin
programme.desc: After a chance, pre-arranged meeting, Nisha and Sunil meet, fall in love, marry and move in with Sunils wealthy family.

programme.title: Super 30
programme.desc: Brilliant mathematician Anand Kumar helps 30 smart but underprivileged students prepare for entrance exams for the Indian Institutes of Technology.

programme.title: Hichki
programme.desc: After several interviews and numerous rejections, a woman who has Tourettes syndrome lands a job as a teacher at an elite school. She soon tries to do whatever she can to make her rebellious and troublemaking students realise their full potential.

programme.title: Chak De India
programme.desc: After failing to score the winning goal, Kabir Khan, Captain of the Mens Hockey Team is blamed for the teams loss and fired. Years later he is given a chance to salvage his reputation, when he is offered the position as coach of the Womens Hockey Team.

programme.title: Mohabbatein
programme.desc: The Principal of a prestigious college, Narayan Shankar, decides to rusticate one of his students, Raj Malhotra.

programme.title: Dhoom
programme.desc: A gang of robbers on hi-tech motorbikes, led by the charismatic Kabir, is sweeping through Mumbai, outwitting the police at every turn. When officer Jai Dixit is assigned to catch the criminals, he reluctantly enlists the help of garage mechanic and bike enthusiast Ali. Though the pair do not see eye-to-eye at first, they soon become a formidable team, tracking their enemies from the streets of Mumbai to the beaches of Goa.
